line_text: Who's there?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Nay, answer me: stand, and unfold yourself.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Long live the king!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Bernardo?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: He.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: You come most carefully upon your hour.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: 'Tis now struck twelve; get thee to bed, Francisco.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: For this relief much thanks: 'tis bitter cold,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And I am sick at heart.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Have you had quiet guard?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Not a mouse stirring.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Well, good night.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: If you do meet Horatio and Marcellus,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: The rivals of my watch, bid them make haste.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: I think I hear them. Stand, ho! Who's there?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Friends to this ground.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And liegemen to the Dane.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Give you good night.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: O, farewell, honest soldier:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Who hath relieved you?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Bernardo has my place.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Give you good night.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Holla! Bernardo!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Say,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: What, is Horatio there?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: A piece of him.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Welcome, Horatio: welcome, good Marcellus.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: What, has this thing appear'd again to-night?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: I have seen nothing.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Horatio says 'tis but our fantasy,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And will not let belief take hold of him
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Touching this dreaded sight, twice seen of us:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Therefore I have entreated him along
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: With us to watch the minutes of this night;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: That if again this apparition come,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: He may approve our eyes and speak to it.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Tush, tush, 'twill not appear.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Sit down awhile;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And let us once again assail your ears,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: That are so fortified against our story
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: What we have two nights seen.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Well, sit we down,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And let us hear Bernardo speak of this.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Last night of all,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: When yond same star that's westward from the pole
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Had made his course to illume that part of heaven
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Where now it burns, Marcellus and myself,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: The bell then beating one,--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Peace, break thee off; look, where it comes again!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: In the same figure, like the king that's dead.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Thou art a scholar; speak to it, Horatio.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Looks it not like the king?  mark it, Horatio.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Most like: it harrows me with fear and wonder.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: It would be spoke to.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Question it, Horatio.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: What art thou that usurp'st this time of night,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Together with that fair and warlike form
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: In which the majesty of buried Denmark
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Did sometimes march? by heaven I charge thee, speak!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: It is offended.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: See, it stalks away!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Stay! speak, speak! I charge thee, speak!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: 'Tis gone, and will not answer.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: How now, Horatio! you tremble and look pale:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Is not this something more than fantasy?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: What think you on't?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Before my God, I might not this believe
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Without the sensible and true avouch
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Of mine own eyes.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Is it not like the king?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: As thou art to thyself:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Such was the very armour he had on
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: When he the ambitious Norway combated;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: So frown'd he once, when, in an angry parle,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: He smote the sledded Polacks on the ice.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: 'Tis strange.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Thus twice before, and jump at this dead hour,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: With martial stalk hath he gone by our watch.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: In what particular thought to work I know not;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: But in the gross and scope of my opinion,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: This bodes some strange eruption to our state.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Good now, sit down, and tell me, he that knows,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Why this same strict and most observant watch
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: So nightly toils the subject of the land,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And why such daily cast of brazen cannon,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And foreign mart for implements of war;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Why such impress of shipwrights, whose sore task
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Does not divide the Sunday from the week;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: What might be toward, that this sweaty haste
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Doth make the night joint-labourer with the day:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Who is't that can inform me?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: That can I;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: At least, the whisper goes so. Our last king,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Whose image even but now appear'd to us,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Was, as you know, by Fortinbras of Norway,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Thereto prick'd on by a most emulate pride,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Dared to the combat; in which our valiant Hamlet--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: For so this side of our known world esteem'd him--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Did slay this Fortinbras; who by a seal'd compact,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Well ratified by law and heraldry,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Did forfeit, with his life, all those his lands
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Which he stood seized of, to the conqueror:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Against the which, a moiety competent
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Was gaged by our king; which had return'd
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: To the inheritance of Fortinbras,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Had he been vanquisher; as, by the same covenant,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And carriage of the article design'd,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: His fell to Hamlet. Now, sir, young Fortinbras,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Of unimproved mettle hot and full,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Hath in the skirts of Norway here and there
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Shark'd up a list of lawless resolutes,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: For food and diet, to some enterprise
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: That hath a stomach in't; which is no other--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: As it doth well appear unto our state--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: But to recover of us, by strong hand
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And terms compulsatory, those foresaid lands
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: So by his father lost: and this, I take it,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Is the main motive of our preparations,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: The source of this our watch and the chief head
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Of this post-haste and romage in the land.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: I think it be no other but e'en so:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Well may it sort that this portentous figure
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Comes armed through our watch; so like the king
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: That was and is the question of these wars.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: A mote it is to trouble the mind's eye.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: In the most high and palmy state of Rome,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: A little ere the mightiest Julius fell,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: The graves stood tenantless and the sheeted dead
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Did squeak and gibber in the Roman streets:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: As stars with trains of fire and dews of blood,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Disasters in the sun; and the moist star
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Upon whose influence Neptune's empire stands
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Was sick almost to doomsday with eclipse:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And even the like precurse of fierce events,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: As harbingers preceding still the fates
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And prologue to the omen coming on,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Have heaven and earth together demonstrated
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Unto our climatures and countrymen.--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: But soft, behold! lo, where it comes again!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: I'll cross it, though it blast me. Stay, illusion!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: If thou hast any sound, or use of voice,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Speak to me:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: If there be any good thing to be done,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: That may to thee do ease and grace to me,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Speak to me:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: If thou art privy to thy country's fate,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Which, happily, foreknowing may avoid, O, speak!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Or if thou hast uphoarded in thy life
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Extorted treasure in the womb of earth,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: For which, they say, you spirits oft walk in death,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Speak of it: stay, and speak! Stop it, Marcellus.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Shall I strike at it with my partisan?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Do, if it will not stand.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: 'Tis here!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: 'Tis here!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: 'Tis gone!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: We do it wrong, being so majestical,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: To offer it the show of violence;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: For it is, as the air, invulnerable,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And our vain blows malicious mockery.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: It was about to speak, when the cock crew.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And then it started like a guilty thing
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Upon a fearful summons. I have heard,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: The cock, that is the trumpet to the morn,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Doth with his lofty and shrill-sounding throat
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Awake the god of day; and, at his warning,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Whether in sea or fire, in earth or air,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: The extravagant and erring spirit hies
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: To his confine: and of the truth herein
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: This present object made probation.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: It faded on the crowing of the cock.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Some say that ever 'gainst that season comes
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Wherein our Saviour's birth is celebrated,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: The bird of dawning singeth all night long:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: And then, they say, no spirit dares stir abroad;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: The nights are wholesome; then no planets strike,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: No fairy takes, nor witch hath power to charm,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: So hallow'd and so gracious is the time.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: So have I heard and do in part believe it.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: But, look, the morn, in russet mantle clad,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Walks o'er the dew of yon high eastward hill:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Break we our watch up; and by my advice,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Let us impart what we have seen to-night
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Unto young Hamlet; for, upon my life,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: This spirit, dumb to us, will speak to him.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Do you consent we shall acquaint him with it,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: As needful in our loves, fitting our duty?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Let's do't, I pray; and I this morning know
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Where we shall find him most conveniently.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  Elsinore. A platform before the castle.

line_text: Though yet of Hamlet our dear brother's death
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: The memory be green, and that it us befitted
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: To bear our hearts in grief and our whole kingdom
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: To be contracted in one brow of woe,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Yet so far hath discretion fought with nature
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: That we with wisest sorrow think on him,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Together with remembrance of ourselves.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Therefore our sometime sister, now our queen,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: The imperial jointress to this warlike state,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Have we, as 'twere with a defeated joy,--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: With an auspicious and a dropping eye,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: With mirth in funeral and with dirge in marriage,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: In equal scale weighing delight and dole,--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Taken to wife: nor have we herein barr'd
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Your better wisdoms, which have freely gone
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: With this affair along. For all, our thanks.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Now follows, that you know, young Fortinbras,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Holding a weak supposal of our worth,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Or thinking by our late dear brother's death
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Our state to be disjoint and out of frame,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Colleagued with the dream of his advantage,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: He hath not fail'd to pester us with message,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Importing the surrender of those lands
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Lost by his father, with all bonds of law,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: To our most valiant brother. So much for him.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Now for ourself and for this time of meeting:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Thus much the business is: we have here writ
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: To Norway, uncle of young Fortinbras,--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Who, impotent and bed-rid, scarcely hears
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Of this his nephew's purpose,--to suppress
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: His further gait herein; in that the levies,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: The lists and full proportions, are all made
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Out of his subject: and we here dispatch
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: You, good Cornelius, and you, Voltimand,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: For bearers of this greeting to old Norway;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Giving to you no further personal power
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: To business with the king, more than the scope
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Of these delated articles allow.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Farewell, and let your haste commend your duty.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: In that and all things will we show our duty.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: We doubt it nothing: heartily farewell.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And now, Laertes, what's the news with you?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: You told us of some suit; what is't, Laertes?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: You cannot speak of reason to the Dane,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And loose your voice: what wouldst thou beg, Laertes,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: That shall not be my offer, not thy asking?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: The head is not more native to the heart,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: The hand more instrumental to the mouth,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Than is the throne of Denmark to thy father.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: What wouldst thou have, Laertes?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: My dread lord,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Your leave and favour to return to France;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: From whence though willingly I came to Denmark,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: To show my duty in your coronation,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Yet now, I must confess, that duty done,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: My thoughts and wishes bend again toward France
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And bow them to your gracious leave and pardon.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Have you your father's leave? What says Polonius?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: He hath, my lord, wrung from me my slow leave
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: By laboursome petition, and at last
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Upon his will I seal'd my hard consent:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: I do beseech you, give him leave to go.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Take thy fair hour, Laertes; time be thine,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And thy best graces spend it at thy will!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: But now, my cousin Hamlet, and my son,--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: How is it that the clouds still hang on you?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Not so, my lord; I am too much i' the sun.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Good Hamlet, cast thy nighted colour off,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And let thine eye look like a friend on Denmark.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Do not for ever with thy vailed lids
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Seek for thy noble father in the dust:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Thou know'st 'tis common; all that lives must die,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Passing through nature to eternity.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Ay, madam, it is common.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: If it be,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Why seems it so particular with thee?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Seems, madam! nay it is; I know not 'seems.'
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: 'Tis not alone my inky cloak, good mother,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Nor customary suits of solemn black,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Nor windy suspiration of forced breath,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: No, nor the fruitful river in the eye,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Nor the dejected 'havior of the visage,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Together with all forms, moods, shapes of grief,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: That can denote me truly: these indeed seem,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: For they are actions that a man might play:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: But I have that within which passeth show;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: These but the trappings and the suits of woe.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: 'Tis sweet and commendable in your nature, Hamlet,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: To give these mourning duties to your father:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: But, you must know, your father lost a father;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: That father lost, lost his, and the survivor bound
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: In filial obligation for some term
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: To do obsequious sorrow: but to persever
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: In obstinate condolement is a course
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Of impious stubbornness; 'tis unmanly grief;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: It shows a will most incorrect to heaven,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: A heart unfortified, a mind impatient,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: An understanding simple and unschool'd:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: For what we know must be and is as common
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: As any the most vulgar thing to sense,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Why should we in our peevish opposition
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Take it to heart? Fie! 'tis a fault to heaven,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: A fault against the dead, a fault to nature,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: To reason most absurd: whose common theme
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Is death of fathers, and who still hath cried,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: From the first corse till he that died to-day,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: 'This must be so.' We pray you, throw to earth
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: This unprevailing woe, and think of us
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: As of a father: for let the world take note,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: You are the most immediate to our throne;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And with no less nobility of love
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Than that which dearest father bears his son,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Do I impart toward you. For your intent
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: In going back to school in Wittenberg,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: It is most retrograde to our desire:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And we beseech you, bend you to remain
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Here, in the cheer and comfort of our eye,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Our chiefest courtier, cousin, and our son.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Let not thy mother lose her prayers, Hamlet:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: I pray thee, stay with us; go not to Wittenberg.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: I shall in all my best obey you, madam.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Why, 'tis a loving and a fair reply:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Be as ourself in Denmark. Madam, come;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: This gentle and unforced accord of Hamlet
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Sits smiling to my heart: in grace whereof,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: No jocund health that Denmark drinks to-day,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: But the great cannon to the clouds shall tell,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And the king's rouse the heavens all bruit again,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Re-speaking earthly thunder. Come away.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: O, that this too too solid flesh would melt
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Thaw and resolve itself into a dew!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Or that the Everlasting had not fix'd
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: His canon 'gainst self-slaughter! O God! God!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: How weary, stale, flat and unprofitable,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Seem to me all the uses of this world!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Fie on't! ah fie! 'tis an unweeded garden,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: That grows to seed; things rank and gross in nature
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Possess it merely. That it should come to this!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: But two months dead: nay, not so much, not two:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: So excellent a king; that was, to this,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Hyperion to a satyr; so loving to my mother
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: That he might not beteem the winds of heaven
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Visit her face too roughly. Heaven and earth!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Must I remember? why, she would hang on him,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: As if increase of appetite had grown
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: By what it fed on: and yet, within a month--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Let me not think on't--Frailty, thy name is woman!--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: A little month, or ere those shoes were old
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: With which she follow'd my poor father's body,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Like Niobe, all tears:--why she, even she--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: O, God! a beast, that wants discourse of reason,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Would have mourn'd longer--married with my uncle,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: My father's brother, but no more like my father
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Than I to Hercules: within a month:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Ere yet the salt of most unrighteous tears
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Had left the flushing in her galled eyes,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: She married. O, most wicked speed, to post
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: With such dexterity to incestuous sheets!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: It is not nor it cannot come to good:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: But break, my heart; for I must hold my tongue.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Hail to your lordship!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: I am glad to see you well:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Horatio,--or I do forget myself.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: The same, my lord, and your poor servant ever.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Sir, my good friend; I'll change that name with you:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And what make you from Wittenberg, Horatio? Marcellus?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: My good lord--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: I am very glad to see you. Good even, sir.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: But what, in faith, make you from Wittenberg?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: A truant disposition, good my lord.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: I would not hear your enemy say so,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Nor shall you do mine ear that violence,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: To make it truster of your own report
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Against yourself: I know you are no truant.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: But what is your affair in Elsinore?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: We'll teach you to drink deep ere you depart.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: My lord, I came to see your father's funeral.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: I pray thee, do not mock me, fellow-student;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: I think it was to see my mother's wedding.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Indeed, my lord, it follow'd hard upon.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Thrift, thrift, Horatio! the funeral baked meats
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Did coldly furnish forth the marriage tables.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Would I had met my dearest foe in heaven
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Or ever I had seen that day, Horatio!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: My father!--methinks I see my father.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Where, my lord?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: In my mind's eye, Horatio.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: I saw him once; he was a goodly king.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: He was a man, take him for all in all,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: I shall not look upon his like again.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: My lord, I think I saw him yesternight.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Saw? who?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: My lord, the king your father.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: The king my father!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Season your admiration for awhile
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: With an attent ear, till I may deliver,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Upon the witness of these gentlemen,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: This marvel to you.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: For God's love, let me hear.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Two nights together had these gentlemen,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Marcellus and Bernardo, on their watch,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: In the dead vast and middle of the night,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Been thus encounter'd. A figure like your father,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Armed at point exactly, cap-a-pe,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Appears before them, and with solemn march
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Goes slow and stately by them: thrice he walk'd
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: By their oppress'd and fear-surprised eyes,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Within his truncheon's length; whilst they, distilled
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Almost to jelly with the act of fear,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Stand dumb and speak not to him. This to me
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: In dreadful secrecy impart they did;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And I with them the third night kept the watch;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Where, as they had deliver'd, both in time,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Form of the thing, each word made true and good,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: The apparition comes: I knew your father;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: These hands are not more like.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: But where was this?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: My lord, upon the platform where we watch'd.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Did you not speak to it?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: My lord, I did;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: But answer made it none: yet once methought
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: It lifted up its head and did address
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Itself to motion, like as it would speak;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: But even then the morning cock crew loud,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And at the sound it shrunk in haste away,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And vanish'd from our sight.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: 'Tis very strange.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: As I do live, my honour'd lord, 'tis true;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And we did think it writ down in our duty
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: To let you know of it.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Indeed, indeed, sirs, but this troubles me.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Hold you the watch to-night?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: We do, my lord.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Arm'd, say you?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Arm'd, my lord.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: From top to toe?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: My lord, from head to foot.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Then saw you not his face?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: O, yes, my lord; he wore his beaver up.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: What, look'd he frowningly?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: A countenance more in sorrow than in anger.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Pale or red?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Nay, very pale.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: And fix'd his eyes upon you?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Most constantly.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: I would I had been there.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: It would have much amazed you.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Very like, very like. Stay'd it long?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: While one with moderate haste might tell a hundred.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Longer, longer.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: Not when I saw't.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: His beard was grizzled--no?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: It was, as I have seen it in his life,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room of state in the castle.

line_text: But mere implorators of unholy suits,

line_text: Breathing like sanctified and pious bawds,

line_text: The better to beguile. This is for all:

line_text: I would not, in plain terms, from this time forth,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in Polonius' house.

line_text: Have you so slander any moment leisure,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in Polonius' house.

line_text: As to give words or talk with the Lord Hamlet.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in Polonius' house.

line_text: Look to't, I charge you: come your ways.

line_text: I shall obey, my lord.

scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in Polonius' house.

line_text: The air bites shrewdly; it is very cold.

scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: It is a nipping and an eager air.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: What hour now?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: I think it lacks of twelve.
