line_text: No, it is struck.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Indeed? I heard it not: then it draws near the season
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Wherein the spirit held his wont to walk.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: What does this mean, my lord?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: The king doth wake to-night and takes his rouse,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Keeps wassail, and the swaggering up-spring reels;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: And, as he drains his draughts of Rhenish down,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: The kettle-drum and trumpet thus bray out
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: The triumph of his pledge.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Is it a custom?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Ay, marry, is't:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: But to my mind, though I am native here
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: And to the manner born, it is a custom
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: More honour'd in the breach than the observance.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: This heavy-headed revel east and west
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Makes us traduced and tax'd of other nations:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: They clepe us drunkards, and with swinish phrase
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Soil our addition; and indeed it takes
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: From our achievements, though perform'd at height,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: The pith and marrow of our attribute.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: So, oft it chances in particular men,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: That for some vicious mole of nature in them,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: As, in their birth--wherein they are not guilty,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Since nature cannot choose his origin--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: By the o'ergrowth of some complexion,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Oft breaking down the pales and forts of reason,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Or by some habit that too much o'er-leavens
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: The form of plausive manners, that these men,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Carrying, I say, the stamp of one defect,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Being nature's livery, or fortune's star,--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Their virtues else--be they as pure as grace,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: As infinite as man may undergo--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Shall in the general censure take corruption
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: From that particular fault: the dram of eale
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Doth all the noble substance of a doubt
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: To his own scandal.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Look, my lord, it comes!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Angels and ministers of grace defend us!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Be thou a spirit of health or goblin damn'd,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Bring with thee airs from heaven or blasts from hell,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Be thy intents wicked or charitable,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Thou comest in such a questionable shape
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: That I will speak to thee: I'll call thee Hamlet,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: King, father, royal Dane: O, answer me!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Let me not burst in ignorance; but tell
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Why thy canonized bones, hearsed in death,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Have burst their cerements; why the sepulchre,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Wherein we saw thee quietly inurn'd,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Hath oped his ponderous and marble jaws,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: To cast thee up again. What may this mean,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: That thou, dead corse, again in complete steel
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Revisit'st thus the glimpses of the moon,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Making night hideous; and we fools of nature
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: So horridly to shake our disposition
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: With thoughts beyond the reaches of our souls?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Say, why is this? wherefore? what should we do?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: It beckons you to go away with it,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: As if it some impartment did desire
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: To you alone.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Look, with what courteous action
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: It waves you to a more removed ground:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: But do not go with it.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: No, by no means.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: It will not speak; then I will follow it.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Do not, my lord.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Why, what should be the fear?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: I do not set my life in a pin's fee;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: And for my soul, what can it do to that,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Being a thing immortal as itself?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: It waves me forth again: I'll follow it.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: What if it tempt you toward the flood, my lord,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Or to the dreadful summit of the cliff
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: That beetles o'er his base into the sea,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: And there assume some other horrible form,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Which might deprive your sovereignty of reason
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: And draw you into madness? think of it:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: The very place puts toys of desperation,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Without more motive, into every brain
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: That looks so many fathoms to the sea
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: And hears it roar beneath.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: It waves me still.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Go on; I'll follow thee.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: You shall not go, my lord.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Hold off your hands.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Be ruled; you shall not go.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: My fate cries out,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: And makes each petty artery in this body
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: As hardy as the Nemean lion's nerve.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Still am I call'd. Unhand me, gentlemen.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: By heaven, I'll make a ghost of him that lets me!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: I say, away! Go on; I'll follow thee.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: He waxes desperate with imagination.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Let's follow; 'tis not fit thus to obey him.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Have after. To what issue will this come?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Something is rotten in the state of Denmark.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Heaven will direct it.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Nay, let's follow him.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The platform.

line_text: Where wilt thou lead me? speak; I'll go no further.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Mark me.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: I will.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: My hour is almost come,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: When I to sulphurous and tormenting flames
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Must render up myself.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Alas, poor ghost!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Pity me not, but lend thy serious hearing
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: To what I shall unfold.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Speak; I am bound to hear.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: So art thou to revenge, when thou shalt hear.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: What?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: I am thy father's spirit,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Doom'd for a certain term to walk the night,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And for the day confined to fast in fires,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Till the foul crimes done in my days of nature
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Are burnt and purged away. But that I am forbid
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: To tell the secrets of my prison-house,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: I could a tale unfold whose lightest word
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Would harrow up thy soul, freeze thy young blood,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Make thy two eyes, like stars, start from their spheres,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Thy knotted and combined locks to part
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And each particular hair to stand on end,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Like quills upon the fretful porpentine:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: But this eternal blazon must not be
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: To ears of flesh and blood. List, list, O, list!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: If thou didst ever thy dear father love--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: O God!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Revenge his foul and most unnatural murder.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Murder!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Murder most foul, as in the best it is;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: But this most foul, strange and unnatural.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Haste me to know't, that I, with wings as swift
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: As meditation or the thoughts of love,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: May sweep to my revenge.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: I find thee apt;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And duller shouldst thou be than the fat weed
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: That roots itself in ease on Lethe wharf,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Wouldst thou not stir in this. Now, Hamlet, hear:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: 'Tis given out that, sleeping in my orchard,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: A serpent stung me; so the whole ear of Denmark
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Is by a forged process of my death
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Rankly abused: but know, thou noble youth,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: The serpent that did sting thy father's life
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Now wears his crown.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: O my prophetic soul! My uncle!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Ay, that incestuous, that adulterate beast,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: With witchcraft of his wit, with traitorous gifts,--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: O wicked wit and gifts, that have the power
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: So to seduce!--won to his shameful lust
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: The will of my most seeming-virtuous queen:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: O Hamlet, what a falling-off was there!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: From me, whose love was of that dignity
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: That it went hand in hand even with the vow
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: I made to her in marriage, and to decline
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Upon a wretch whose natural gifts were poor
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: To those of mine!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: But virtue, as it never will be moved,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Though lewdness court it in a shape of heaven,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: So lust, though to a radiant angel link'd,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Will sate itself in a celestial bed,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And prey on garbage.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: But, soft! methinks I scent the morning air;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Brief let me be. Sleeping within my orchard,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: My custom always of the afternoon,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Upon my secure hour thy uncle stole,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: With juice of cursed hebenon in a vial,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And in the porches of my ears did pour
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: The leperous distilment; whose effect
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Holds such an enmity with blood of man
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: That swift as quicksilver it courses through
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: The natural gates and alleys of the body,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And with a sudden vigour doth posset
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And curd, like eager droppings into milk,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: The thin and wholesome blood: so did it mine;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And a most instant tetter bark'd about,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Most lazar-like, with vile and loathsome crust,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: All my smooth body.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Thus was I, sleeping, by a brother's hand
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Of life, of crown, of queen, at once dispatch'd:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Cut off even in the blossoms of my sin,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Unhousel'd, disappointed, unanel'd,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: No reckoning made, but sent to my account
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: With all my imperfections on my head:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: O, horrible! O, horrible! most horrible!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: If thou hast nature in thee, bear it not;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Let not the royal bed of Denmark be
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: A couch for luxury and damned incest.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: But, howsoever thou pursuest this act,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Taint not thy mind, nor let thy soul contrive
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Against thy mother aught: leave her to heaven
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And to those thorns that in her bosom lodge,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: To prick and sting her. Fare thee well at once!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: The glow-worm shows the matin to be near,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And 'gins to pale his uneffectual fire:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Adieu, adieu! Hamlet, remember me.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: O all you host of heaven! O earth! what else?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And shall I couple hell? O, fie! Hold, hold, my heart;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And you, my sinews, grow not instant old,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: But bear me stiffly up. Remember thee!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Ay, thou poor ghost, while memory holds a seat
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: In this distracted globe. Remember thee!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Yea, from the table of my memory
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: I'll wipe away all trivial fond records,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: All saws of books, all forms, all pressures past,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: That youth and observation copied there;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And thy commandment all alone shall live
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Within the book and volume of my brain,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Unmix'd with baser matter: yes, by heaven!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: O most pernicious woman!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: O villain, villain, smiling, damned villain!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: My tables,--meet it is I set it down,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: That one may smile, and smile, and be a villain;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: At least I'm sure it may be so in Denmark:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: So, uncle, there you are. Now to my word;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: It is 'Adieu, adieu! remember me.'
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: I have sworn 't.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: So be it!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Hillo, ho, ho, boy! come, bird, come.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: How is't, my noble lord?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: What news, my lord?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: O, wonderful!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Good my lord, tell it.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: No; you'll reveal it.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Not I, my lord, by heaven.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Nor I, my lord.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: How say you, then; would heart of man once think it?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: But you'll be secret?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Ay, by heaven, my lord.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: There's ne'er a villain dwelling in all Denmark
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: But he's an arrant knave.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: There needs no ghost, my lord, come from the grave
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: To tell us this.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Why, right; you are i' the right;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And so, without more circumstance at all,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: I hold it fit that we shake hands and part:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: You, as your business and desire shall point you;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: For every man has business and desire,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Such as it is; and for mine own poor part,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Look you, I'll go pray.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: These are but wild and whirling words, my lord.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: I'm sorry they offend you, heartily;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Yes, 'faith heartily.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: There's no offence, my lord.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Yes, by Saint Patrick, but there is, Horatio,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And much offence too. Touching this vision here,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: It is an honest ghost, that let me tell you:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: For your desire to know what is between us,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: O'ermaster 't as you may. And now, good friends,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: As you are friends, scholars and soldiers,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Give me one poor request.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: What is't, my lord? we will.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Never make known what you have seen to-night.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: My lord, we will not.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Nay, but swear't.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: In faith,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: My lord, not I.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Nor I, my lord, in faith.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Upon my sword.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: We have sworn, my lord, already.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Indeed, upon my sword, indeed.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Ah, ha, boy! say'st thou so? art thou there,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: truepenny?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Come on--you hear this fellow in the cellarage--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Consent to swear.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Propose the oath, my lord.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Never to speak of this that you have seen,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Swear by my sword.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Hic et ubique? then we'll shift our ground.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Come hither, gentlemen,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And lay your hands again upon my sword:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Never to speak of this that you have heard,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Swear by my sword.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Well said, old mole! canst work i' the earth so fast?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: A worthy pioner! Once more remove, good friends.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: O day and night, but this is wondrous strange!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And therefore as a stranger give it welcome.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: There are more things in heaven and earth, Horatio,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Than are dreamt of in your philosophy. But come;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Here, as before, never, so help you mercy,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: How strange or odd soe'er I bear myself,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: As I perchance hereafter shall think meet
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: To put an antic disposition on,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: That you, at such times seeing me, never shall,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: With arms encumber'd thus, or this headshake,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Or by pronouncing of some doubtful phrase,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: As 'Well, well, we know,' or 'We could, an if we would,'
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Or 'If we list to speak,' or 'There be, an if they might,'
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Or such ambiguous giving out, to note
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: That you know aught of me: this not to do,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: So grace and mercy at your most need help you, Swear.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Rest, rest, perturbed spirit!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: So, gentlemen,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: With all my love I do commend me to you:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And what so poor a man as Hamlet is
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: May do, to express his love and friending to you,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: God willing, shall not lack. Let us go in together;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: And still your fingers on your lips, I pray.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: The time is out of joint: O cursed spite,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: That ever I was born to set it right!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Nay, come, let's go together.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.

line_text: Give him this money and these notes, Reynaldo.

line_text: Marry, well said; very well said. Look you, sir,

line_text: Ay, my lord,

line_text: I would know that.

line_text: Marry, sir, here's my drift;

line_text: And I believe, it is a fetch of wit:

line_text: You laying these slight sullies on my son,

line_text: As 'twere a thing a little soil'd i' the working, Mark you,

line_text: Your party in converse, him you would sound,

line_text: Having ever seen in the prenominate crimes

scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: The youth you breathe of guilty, be assured
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: He closes with you in this consequence;

line_text: 'Good sir,' or so, or 'friend,' or 'gentleman,'

line_text: Of man and country.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: Your bait of falsehood takes this carp of truth:

line_text: By indirections find directions out:

scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: God be wi' you; fare you well.

line_text: Good my lord!

line_text: With what, i' the name of God?

line_text: My lord, as I was sewing in my closet,

scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: Lord Hamlet, with his doublet all unbraced;

scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: No hat upon his head; his stockings foul'd,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: Ungarter'd, and down-gyved to his ancle;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: Pale as his shirt; his knees knocking each other;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: And with a look so piteous in purport
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: As if he had been loosed out of hell
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: To speak of horrors,--he comes before me.

scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: Mad for thy love?

scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: My lord, I do not know;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: But truly, I do fear it.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: What said he?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: He took me by the wrist and held me hard;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: Then goes he to the length of all his arm;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: And, with his other hand thus o'er his brow,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: He falls to such perusal of my face
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: As he would draw it. Long stay'd he so;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: At last, a little shaking of mine arm
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: And thrice his head thus waving up and down,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: He raised a sigh so piteous and profound
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: As it did seem to shatter all his bulk
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: And end his being: that done, he lets me go:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: And, with his head over his shoulder turn'd,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: He seem'd to find his way without his eyes;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: For out o' doors he went without their helps,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: And, to the last, bended their light on me.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: Come, go with me: I will go seek the king.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: This is the very ecstasy of love,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: Whose violent property fordoes itself
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: And leads the will to desperate undertakings
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: As oft as any passion under heaven
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: That does afflict our natures. I am sorry.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: What, have you given him any hard words of late?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: No, my good lord, but, as you did command,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: I did repel his fetters and denied
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: His access to me.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: That hath made him mad.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: I am sorry that with better heed and judgment
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: I had not quoted him: I fear'd he did but trifle,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: And meant to wreck thee; but, beshrew my jealousy!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: By heaven, it is as proper to our age
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: To cast beyond ourselves in our opinions
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: As it is common for the younger sort
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: To lack discretion. Come, go we to the king:

scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: This must be known; which, being kept close, might

scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

line_text: move

scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: The need we have to use you did provoke
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Our hasty sending. Something have you heard

scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Of Hamlet's transformation; so call it,

scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Sith nor the exterior nor the inward man

scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Resembles that it was. What it should be,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: More than his father's death, that thus hath put him
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: So much from the understanding of himself,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: I cannot dream of: I entreat you both,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: That, being of so young days brought up with him,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And sith so neighbour'd to his youth and havior,

scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: That you vouchsafe your rest here in our court
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Some little time: so by your companies

scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: To draw him on to pleasures, and to gather,
