scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: So much as from occasion you may glean,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Whether aught, to us unknown, afflicts him thus,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: That, open'd, lies within our remedy.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Good gentlemen, he hath much talk'd of you;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And sure I am two men there are not living
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: To whom he more adheres. If it will please you
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: To show us so much gentry and good will
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: As to expend your time with us awhile,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: For the supply and profit of our hope,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Your visitation shall receive such thanks
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: As fits a king's remembrance.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Both your majesties
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Might, by the sovereign power you have of us,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Put your dread pleasures more into command
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Than to entreaty.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: But we both obey,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And here give up ourselves, in the full bent
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: To lay our service freely at your feet,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: To be commanded.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Thanks, Rosencrantz and gentle Guildenstern.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Thanks, Guildenstern and gentle Rosencrantz:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And I beseech you instantly to visit
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: My too much changed son. Go, some of you,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And bring these gentlemen where Hamlet is.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Heavens make our presence and our practises
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Pleasant and helpful to him!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Ay, amen!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: The ambassadors from Norway, my good lord,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Are joyfully return'd.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Thou still hast been the father of good news.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Have I, my lord? I assure my good liege,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: I hold my duty, as I hold my soul,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Both to my God and to my gracious king:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And I do think, or else this brain of mine
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Hunts not the trail of policy so sure
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: As it hath used to do, that I have found
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: The very cause of Hamlet's lunacy.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: O, speak of that; that do I long to hear.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Give first admittance to the ambassadors;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: My news shall be the fruit to that great feast.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Thyself do grace to them, and bring them in.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: He tells me, my dear Gertrude, he hath found
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: The head and source of all your son's distemper.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: I doubt it is no other but the main;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: His father's death, and our o'erhasty marriage.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Well, we shall sift him.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Welcome, my good friends!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Say, Voltimand, what from our brother Norway?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Most fair return of greetings and desires.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Upon our first, he sent out to suppress
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: His nephew's levies; which to him appear'd
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: To be a preparation 'gainst the Polack;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: But, better look'd into, he truly found
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: It was against your highness: whereat grieved,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: That so his sickness, age and impotence
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Was falsely borne in hand, sends out arrests
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: On Fortinbras; which he, in brief, obeys;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Receives rebuke from Norway, and in fine
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Makes vow before his uncle never more
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: To give the assay of arms against your majesty.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Whereon old Norway, overcome with joy,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Gives him three thousand crowns in annual fee,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And his commission to employ those soldiers,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: So levied as before, against the Polack:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: With an entreaty, herein further shown,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: That it might please you to give quiet pass
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Through your dominions for this enterprise,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: On such regards of safety and allowance
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: As therein are set down.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: It likes us well;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And at our more consider'd time well read,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Answer, and think upon this business.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Meantime we thank you for your well-took labour:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Go to your rest; at night we'll feast together:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Most welcome home!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: This business is well ended.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: My liege, and madam, to expostulate
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: What majesty should be, what duty is,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Why day is day, night night, and time is time,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Were nothing but to waste night, day and time.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Therefore, since brevity is the soul of wit,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And tediousness the limbs and outward flourishes,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: I will be brief: your noble son is mad:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Mad call I it; for, to define true madness,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: What is't but to be nothing else but mad?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: But let that go.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: More matter, with less art.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Madam, I swear I use no art at all.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: That he is mad, 'tis true: 'tis true 'tis pity;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And pity 'tis 'tis true: a foolish figure;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: But farewell it, for I will use no art.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Mad let us grant him, then: and now remains
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: That we find out the cause of this effect,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Or rather say, the cause of this defect,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: For this effect defective comes by cause:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Thus it remains, and the remainder thus. Perpend.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: I have a daughter--have while she is mine--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Who, in her duty and obedience, mark,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Hath given me this: now gather, and surmise.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: 'To the celestial and my soul's idol, the most
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: beautified Ophelia,'--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: That's an ill phrase, a vile phrase; 'beautified' is
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: a vile phrase: but you shall hear. Thus:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: 'In her excellent white bosom, these, &c.'
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Came this from Hamlet to her?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Good madam, stay awhile; I will be faithful.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: 'Doubt thou the stars are fire;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Doubt that the sun doth move;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Doubt truth to be a liar;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: But never doubt I love.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: 'O dear Ophelia, I am ill at these numbers;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: I have not art to reckon my groans: but that
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: I love thee best, O most best, believe it. Adieu.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: 'Thine evermore most dear lady, whilst
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: this machine is to him, HAMLET.'
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: This, in obedience, hath my daughter shown me,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And more above, hath his solicitings,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: As they fell out by time, by means and place,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: All given to mine ear.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: But how hath she
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Received his love?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: What do you think of me?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: As of a man faithful and honourable.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: I would fain prove so. But what might you think,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: When I had seen this hot love on the wing--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: As I perceived it, I must tell you that,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Before my daughter told me--what might you,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Or my dear majesty your queen here, think,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: If I had play'd the desk or table-book,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Or given my heart a winking, mute and dumb,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Or look'd upon this love with idle sight;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: What might you think? No, I went round to work,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And my young mistress thus I did bespeak:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: 'Lord Hamlet is a prince, out of thy star;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: This must not be:' and then I precepts gave her,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: That she should lock herself from his resort,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Admit no messengers, receive no tokens.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Which done, she took the fruits of my advice;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And he, repulsed--a short tale to make--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Fell into a sadness, then into a fast,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Thence to a watch, thence into a weakness,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Thence to a lightness, and, by this declension,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Into the madness wherein now he raves,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And all we mourn for.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Do you think 'tis this?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: It may be, very likely.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Hath there been such a time--I'd fain know that--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: That I have positively said 'Tis so,'
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: When it proved otherwise?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Not that I know.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Take this from this, if this be otherwise:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: If circumstances lead me, I will find
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Where truth is hid, though it were hid indeed
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Within the centre.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: How may we try it further?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: You know, sometimes he walks four hours together
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Here in the lobby.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark

line_text: Be soft as sinews of the newborn babe!

scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: O, this is hire and salary, not revenge.

scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: He took my father grossly, full of bread;

line_text: With all his crimes broad blown, as flush as May;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And how his audit stands who knows save heaven?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: But in our circumstance and course of thought,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: 'Tis heavy with him: and am I then revenged,

scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: When he is fit and season'd for his passage?

scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: No!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Up, sword; and know thou a more horrid hent:

scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: When he is drunk asleep, or in his rage,

line_text: Or in the incestuous pleasure of his bed;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: At gaming, swearing, or about some act
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: That has no relish of salvation in't;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Then trip him, that his heels may kick at heaven,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And that his soul may be as damn'd and black
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: As hell, whereto it goes. My mother stays:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: This physic but prolongs thy sickly days.

scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

scene_title: SCENE III.  A room in the castle.

line_text: He will come straight. Look you lay home to him:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Tell him his pranks have been too broad to bear with,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And that your grace hath screen'd and stood between
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Much heat and him. I'll sconce me even here.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Pray you, be round with him.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: I'll warrant you,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Fear me not: withdraw, I hear him coming.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Now, mother, what's the matter?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Hamlet, thou hast thy father much offended.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Mother, you have my father much offended.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Come, come, you answer with an idle tongue.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Go, go, you question with a wicked tongue.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Why, how now, Hamlet!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: What's the matter now?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Have you forgot me?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: No, by the rood, not so:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: You are the queen, your husband's brother's wife;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And--would it were not so!--you are my mother.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Nay, then, I'll set those to you that can speak.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Come, come, and sit you down; you shall not budge;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: You go not till I set you up a glass
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Where you may see the inmost part of you.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: What wilt thou do? thou wilt not murder me?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Help, help, ho!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: O me, what hast thou done?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Nay, I know not:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Is it the king?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: O, what a rash and bloody deed is this!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: A bloody deed! almost as bad, good mother,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: As kill a king, and marry with his brother.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: As kill a king!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Ay, lady, 'twas my word.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Thou wretched, rash, intruding fool, farewell!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: I took thee for thy better: take thy fortune;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Thou find'st to be too busy is some danger.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Leave wringing of your hands: peace! sit you down,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And let me wring your heart; for so I shall,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: If it be made of penetrable stuff,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: If damned custom have not brass'd it so
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: That it is proof and bulwark against sense.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: What have I done, that thou darest wag thy tongue
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: In noise so rude against me?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Such an act
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: That blurs the grace and blush of modesty,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Calls virtue hypocrite, takes off the rose
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: From the fair forehead of an innocent love
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And sets a blister there, makes marriage-vows
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: As false as dicers' oaths: O, such a deed
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: As from the body of contraction plucks
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: The very soul, and sweet religion makes
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: A rhapsody of words: heaven's face doth glow:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Yea, this solidity and compound mass,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: With tristful visage, as against the doom,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Is thought-sick at the act.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Ay me, what act,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: That roars so loud, and thunders in the index?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Look here, upon this picture, and on this,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: The counterfeit presentment of two brothers.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: See, what a grace was seated on this brow;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Hyperion's curls; the front of Jove himself;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: An eye like Mars, to threaten and command;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: A station like the herald Mercury
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: New-lighted on a heaven-kissing hill;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: A combination and a form indeed,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Where every god did seem to set his seal,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: To give the world assurance of a man:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: This was your husband. Look you now, what follows:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Here is your husband; like a mildew'd ear,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Blasting his wholesome brother. Have you eyes?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Could you on this fair mountain leave to feed,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And batten on this moor? Ha! have you eyes?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: You cannot call it love; for at your age
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: The hey-day in the blood is tame, it's humble,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And waits upon the judgment: and what judgment
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Would step from this to this? Sense, sure, you have,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Else could you not have motion; but sure, that sense
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Is apoplex'd; for madness would not err,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Nor sense to ecstasy was ne'er so thrall'd
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: But it reserved some quantity of choice,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: To serve in such a difference. What devil was't
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: That thus hath cozen'd you at hoodman-blind?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Eyes without feeling, feeling without sight,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Ears without hands or eyes, smelling sans all,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Or but a sickly part of one true sense
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Could not so mope.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: O shame! where is thy blush? Rebellious hell,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: If thou canst mutine in a matron's bones,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: To flaming youth let virtue be as wax,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And melt in her own fire: proclaim no shame
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: When the compulsive ardour gives the charge,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Since frost itself as actively doth burn
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And reason panders will.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: O Hamlet, speak no more:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Thou turn'st mine eyes into my very soul;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And there I see such black and grained spots
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: As will not leave their tinct.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Nay, but to live
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: In the rank sweat of an enseamed bed,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Stew'd in corruption, honeying and making love
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Over the nasty sty,--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: O, speak to me no more;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: These words, like daggers, enter in mine ears;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: No more, sweet Hamlet!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: A murderer and a villain;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: A slave that is not twentieth part the tithe
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Of your precedent lord; a vice of kings;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: A cutpurse of the empire and the rule,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: That from a shelf the precious diadem stole,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And put it in his pocket!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: No more!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: A king of shreds and patches,--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Save me, and hover o'er me with your wings,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: You heavenly guards! What would your gracious figure?

line_text: Alas, he's mad!

scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Do you not come your tardy son to chide,

line_text: That, lapsed in time and passion, lets go by

line_text: The important acting of your dread command? O, say!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Do not forget: this visitation

line_text: Is but to whet thy almost blunted purpose.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: But, look, amazement on thy mother sits:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: O, step between her and her fighting soul:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark

line_text: Conceit in weakest bodies strongest works:

scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Speak to her, Hamlet.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: How is it with you, lady?

scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Alas, how is't with you,

scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: That you do bend your eye on vacancy

scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And with the incorporal air do hold discourse?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Forth at your eyes your spirits wildly peep;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And, as the sleeping soldiers in the alarm,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Your bedded hair, like life in excrements,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Starts up, and stands on end. O gentle son,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Upon the heat and flame of thy distemper
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Sprinkle cool patience. Whereon do you look?

scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: On him, on him! Look you, how pale he glares!

scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: His form and cause conjoin'd, preaching to stones,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Would make them capable. Do not look upon me;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Lest with this piteous action you convert
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: My stern effects: then what I have to do
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Will want true colour; tears perchance for blood.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: To whom do you speak this?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Do you see nothing there?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Nothing at all; yet all that is I see.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Nor did you nothing hear?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: No, nothing but ourselves.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Why, look you there! look, how it steals away!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: My father, in his habit as he lived!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Look, where he goes, even now, out at the portal!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: This the very coinage of your brain:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: This bodiless creation ecstasy
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Is very cunning in.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Ecstasy!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: My pulse, as yours, doth temperately keep time,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And makes as healthful music: it is not madness
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: That I have utter'd: bring me to the test,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And I the matter will re-word; which madness
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Would gambol from. Mother, for love of grace,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Lay not that mattering unction to your soul,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: That not your trespass, but my madness speaks:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: It will but skin and film the ulcerous place,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Whilst rank corruption, mining all within,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Infects unseen. Confess yourself to heaven;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Repent what's past; avoid what is to come;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And do not spread the compost on the weeds,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: To make them ranker. Forgive me this my virtue;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: For in the fatness of these pursy times
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Virtue itself of vice must pardon beg,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Yea, curb and woo for leave to do him good.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: O Hamlet, thou hast cleft my heart in twain.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: O, throw away the worser part of it,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And live the purer with the other half.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Good night: but go not to mine uncle's bed;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Assume a virtue, if you have it not.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: That monster, custom, who all sense doth eat,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Of habits devil, is angel yet in this,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: That to the use of actions fair and good
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: He likewise gives a frock or livery,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: That aptly is put on. Refrain to-night,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And that shall lend a kind of easiness
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: To the next abstinence: the next more easy;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: For use almost can change the stamp of nature,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And either ... the devil, or throw him out
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: With wondrous potency. Once more, good night:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And when you are desirous to be bless'd,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: I'll blessing beg of you. For this same lord,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: I do repent: but heaven hath pleased it so,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: To punish me with this and this with me,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: That I must be their scourge and minister.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: I will bestow him, and will answer well
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: The death I gave him. So, again, good night.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: I must be cruel, only to be kind:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Thus bad begins and worse remains behind.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: One word more, good lady.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: What shall I do?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Not this, by no means, that I bid you do:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Let the bloat king tempt you again to bed;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Pinch wanton on your cheek; call you his mouse;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And let him, for a pair of reechy kisses,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Or paddling in your neck with his damn'd fingers,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Make you to ravel all this matter out,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: That I essentially am not in madness,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: But mad in craft. 'Twere good you let him know;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: For who, that's but a queen, fair, sober, wise,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Would from a paddock, from a bat, a gib,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Such dear concernings hide? who would do so?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: No, in despite of sense and secrecy,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Unpeg the basket on the house's top.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Let the birds fly, and, like the famous ape,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: To try conclusions, in the basket creep,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And break your own neck down.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Be thou assured, if words be made of breath,

scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And breath of life, I have no life to breathe
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: What thou hast said to me.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: I must to England; you know that?

scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Alack,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: I had forgot: 'tis so concluded on.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: There's letters seal'd: and my two schoolfellows,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Whom I will trust as I will adders fang'd,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: They bear the mandate; they must sweep my way,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And marshal me to knavery. Let it work;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: For 'tis the sport to have the engineer
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Hoist with his own petard: and 't shall go hard
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: But I will delve one yard below their mines,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: And blow them at the moon: O, 'tis most sweet,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: When in one line two crafts directly meet.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: This man shall set me packing:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: I'll lug the guts into the neighbour room.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Mother, good night. Indeed this counsellor
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Is now most still, most secret and most grave,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Who was in life a foolish prating knave.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Come, sir, to draw toward an end with you.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: Good night, mother.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The Queen's closet.

line_text: There's matter in these sighs, these profound heaves:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: You must translate: 'tis fit we understand them.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Where is your son?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Bestow this place on us a little while.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Ah, my good lord, what have I seen to-night!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: What, Gertrude? How does Hamlet?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Mad as the sea and wind, when both contend
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Which is the mightier: in his lawless fit,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Behind the arras hearing something stir,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Whips out his rapier, cries, 'A rat, a rat!'
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And, in this brainish apprehension, kills
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: The unseen good old man.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: O heavy deed!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: It had been so with us, had we been there:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: His liberty is full of threats to all;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: To you yourself, to us, to every one.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Alas, how shall this bloody deed be answer'd?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: It will be laid to us, whose providence
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Should have kept short, restrain'd and out of haunt,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: This mad young man: but so much was our love,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: We would not understand what was most fit;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: But, like the owner of a foul disease,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: To keep it from divulging, let it feed
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Even on the pith of Life. Where is he gone?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: To draw apart the body he hath kill'd:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: O'er whom his very madness, like some ore
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Among a mineral of metals base,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Shows itself pure; he weeps for what is done.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: O Gertrude, come away!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: The sun no sooner shall the mountains touch,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: But we will ship him hence: and this vile deed
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: We must, with all our majesty and skill,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Both countenance and excuse. Ho, Guildenstern!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Friends both, go join you with some further aid:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Hamlet in madness hath Polonius slain,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: And from his mother's closet hath he dragg'd him:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Go seek him out; speak fair, and bring the body
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Into the chapel. I pray you, haste in this.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE I.  A room in the castle.

line_text: Come, Gertrude, we'll call up our wisest friends;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
