play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Come, my lord.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: One.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: No.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Judgment.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: A hit, a very palpable hit.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Well; again.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Stay; give me drink. Hamlet, this pearl is thine;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Here's to thy health.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Give him the cup.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: I'll play this bout first; set it by awhile. Come.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Another hit; what say you?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: A touch, a touch, I do confess.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Our son shall win.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: He's fat, and scant of breath.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Here, Hamlet, take my napkin, rub thy brows;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: The queen carouses to thy fortune, Hamlet.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Good madam!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Gertrude, do not drink.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: I will, my lord; I pray you, pardon me.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: I dare not drink yet, madam; by and by.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Come, let me wipe thy face.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: My lord, I'll hit him now.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: I do not think't.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Come, for the third, Laertes: you but dally;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: I pray you, pass with your best violence;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: I am afeard you make a wanton of me.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Say you so? come on.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Nothing, neither way.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Have at you now!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Part them; they are incensed.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Nay, come, again.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Look to the queen there, ho!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: They bleed on both sides. How is it, my lord?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: How is't, Laertes?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Why, as a woodcock to mine own springe, Osric;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: I am justly kill'd with mine own treachery.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: How does the queen?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: She swounds to see them bleed.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: No, no, the drink, the drink,--O my dear Hamlet,--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: The drink, the drink! I am poison'd.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: O villany! Ho! let the door be lock'd:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Treachery! Seek it out.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: It is here, Hamlet: Hamlet, thou art slain;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: No medicine in the world can do thee good;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: In thee there is not half an hour of life;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: The treacherous instrument is in thy hand,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Unbated and envenom'd: the foul practise
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Hath turn'd itself on me lo, here I lie,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Never to rise again: thy mother's poison'd:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: I can no more: the king, the king's to blame.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: The point!--envenom'd too!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Then, venom, to thy work.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Treason! treason!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: O, yet defend me, friends; I am but hurt.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Here, thou incestuous, murderous, damned Dane,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Drink off this potion. Is thy union here?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Follow my mother.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: He is justly served;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: It is a poison temper'd by himself.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Exchange forgiveness with me, noble Hamlet:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Mine and my father's death come not upon thee,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Nor thine on me.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Heaven make thee free of it! I follow thee.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: I am dead, Horatio. Wretched queen, adieu!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: You that look pale and tremble at this chance,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: That are but mutes or audience to this act,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Had I but time--as this fell sergeant, death,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Is strict in his arrest--O, I could tell you--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: But let it be. Horatio, I am dead;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Thou livest; report me and my cause aright
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: To the unsatisfied.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Never believe it:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: I am more an antique Roman than a Dane:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Here's yet some liquor left.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: As thou'rt a man,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Give me the cup: let go; by heaven, I'll have't.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: O good Horatio, what a wounded name,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Things standing thus unknown, shall live behind me!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: If thou didst ever hold me in thy heart
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Absent thee from felicity awhile,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: And in this harsh world draw thy breath in pain,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: To tell my story.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: What warlike noise is this?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Young Fortinbras, with conquest come from Poland,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: To the ambassadors of England gives
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: This warlike volley.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: O, I die, Horatio;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: The potent poison quite o'er-crows my spirit:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: I cannot live to hear the news from England;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: But I do prophesy the election lights
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: On Fortinbras: he has my dying voice;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: So tell him, with the occurrents, more and less,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Which have solicited. The rest is silence.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Now cracks a noble heart. Good night sweet prince:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: And flights of angels sing thee to thy rest!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Why does the drum come hither?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Where is this sight?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: What is it ye would see?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: If aught of woe or wonder, cease your search.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: This quarry cries on havoc. O proud death,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: What feast is toward in thine eternal cell,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: That thou so many princes at a shot
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: So bloodily hast struck?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: The sight is dismal;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: And our affairs from England come too late:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: The ears are senseless that should give us hearing,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: To tell him his commandment is fulfill'd,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: That Rosencrantz and Guildenstern are dead:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Where should we have our thanks?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Not from his mouth,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Had it the ability of life to thank you:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: He never gave commandment for their death.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: But since, so jump upon this bloody question,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: You from the Polack wars, and you from England,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Are here arrived give order that these bodies
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: High on a stage be placed to the view;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: And let me speak to the yet unknowing world
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: How these things came about: so shall you hear
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Of carnal, bloody, and unnatural acts,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Of accidental judgments, casual slaughters,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Of deaths put on by cunning and forced cause,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: And, in this upshot, purposes mistook
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Fall'n on the inventors' reads: all this can I
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Truly deliver.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Let us haste to hear it,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: And call the noblest to the audience.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: For me, with sorrow I embrace my fortune:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: I have some rights of memory in this kingdom,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Which now to claim my vantage doth invite me.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Of that I shall have also cause to speak,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: And from his mouth whose voice will draw on more;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: But let this same be presently perform'd,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Even while men's minds are wild; lest more mischance
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: On plots and errors, happen.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Let four captains
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Bear Hamlet, like a soldier, to the stage;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: For he was likely, had he been put on,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: To have proved most royally: and, for his passage,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: The soldiers' music and the rites of war
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Speak loudly for him.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Take up the bodies: such a sight as this
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Becomes the field, but here shows much amiss.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.

line_text: Go, bid the soldiers shoot.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
scene_title: SCENE II.  A hall in the castle.
